entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:39 a.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:43 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 9:43 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:43 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
